X.iv.1.B.4.b
.
Making a Clemency Discharge Determination
A clemency discharge does not necessarily entitle or reinstate entitlement to benefits administered by VA, and VA must make a decision on the COD.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B  - Special Topics Involving Character of Discharge
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B
